physical_appearance: This is an embroidered tunic. It has short sleeves. It is multicolored, with various coloured panellings and dense embroidered geometrical designs. It has a small square collar.
sgcool_label_text: This is an exceptional example of an embroidered tunic that would be worn by brides in the Lohana Hindu community of Sindh, Pakistan. This is a rare example, showcasing extremely dense, fine embroidery.
subject_terms_1: folk costume geometric motifs embroidery (visual works) wedding dresses tops (garments, general) blouses (main garments) ceremonial costume
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Tunics Motifs Embroidery Sindhi (South Asian people) Wedding costume Blouses
